title: A1 - ENV + HTML
description: Setting up the development environment and creating HTML pages for the Kambaz application.

title: A2 - CSS + Bootstrap
description: Styling the Kambaz application using CSS and the Bootstrap framework for responsive design.

title: A3 - JavaScript + React
description: Implementing interactive features using JavaScript and React components.

title: A1 - Node.js Setup
description: Setting up a Node.js development environment and creating a basic server.

title: A2 - Express Routes
description: Building RESTful API routes using the Express.js framework.

title: A3 - Middleware
description: Implementing middleware for authentication, logging, and error handling.

title: A1 - MongoDB Setup
description: Installing MongoDB and creating your first database with collections.

title: A2 - CRUD Operations
description: Implementing Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations with MongoDB.

title: A3 - Aggregation Pipeline
description: Using MongoDB aggregation framework for complex data queries.

title: A1 - Next.js Pages
description: Creating pages and layouts using Next.js file-based routing.

title: A2 - SSR and SSG
description: Implementing server-side rendering and static site generation.

title: A3 - API Routes
description: Building API routes and server actions in Next.js.

title: A1 - TypeScript Basics
description: Learning TypeScript fundamentals including types, interfaces, and basic annotations.

title: A2 - Generics
description: Implementing generic types and utility types in TypeScript.

title: A1 - HTML Document
description: Creating a well-structured HTML document with semantic elements.

title: A2 - CSS Styling
description: Applying CSS styles including flexbox and grid layouts.

title: A1 - JS Fundamentals
description: Practicing JavaScript fundamentals including variables, functions, and data structures.

title: A2 - DOM Manipulation
description: Working with the DOM to create interactive web pages.
